title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in a Java editor in Photon, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler does not appear when right-clicking on it.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, no popup menu is displayed.
